decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (193/PL01 - Block plan and location plan; 207/PL02 - Existing floor plans; 207/PL03 - Proposed floor plans; 207/PL04 - Existing elevations; 207/PL05 - Proposed elevations; A.03 -  Existing Elevations; A.04 - Proposed Floor Plans; A.05 - Existing Elevations - Received: 18/08/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls (facing 38 Parkwood Road) of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the house
